name: The Sacrifice Table
description:
This game was made for Spooktober GameJam

HOW TO PLAY:

use W A S D to move

use your cursor to aim:

To use the melle attack, left click

To use the projectile, right click

!!!!! THE GAME IS NOT FINISHED YET! WE STILL NEED TO ADD AND FIX MANY THINGS, SO IF YOU FIND ANY BUGS PLEASE WRITE THEM IN THE COMMENTS AND WE WILL FIX THEM ASAP!!!
